summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2927, for the improvement of 13th Avenue Northwest, from West 70th Street to West 75th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and side sewers, therein of proper dimensions and materials together with such appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 35371 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
